name: The Lake House: Children of Silence
name_original: The Lake House: Children of Silence
description:
Long-forgotten memories bubble to the surface when the past invades the present in the Collector's Edition of Lake House: Children of Silence!
Find hidden objects, solve puzzles and prepare yourself for an ending that will take you to a place darker than you can imagine!
Upsell features:
•32 mini-games
•18 hidden object scenes
•50 atmospheric locations
•Ten high resolution wallpapers
•Strategy guide
In-apps can work incorrectly on OS 10.9
The issue will be fixed in a few days
